summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley discussing a potential increase in payments to a small business fund contingent on a tax change regarding bonuses. The email emphasizes confidentiality and may contain privileged information.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, discussing financial matters related to a small business fund.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the recipient of the email, being asked about the possibility of increasing payments to a fund.

keyFacts: The email discusses a potential increase in payments to a small business fund.
The increase is contingent on a tax change regarding bonuses.
The communication is marked as confidential and may be attorney-client privileged.
The email emphasizes the prohibition of unauthorized use or disclosure.
There is a mention of JPMorgan Chase in the context of confidentiality.
